## ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.F.5 - Rumors of Simultaneity

Long before simultaneity became operational, it existed as rumorâ€”circulating through sealed labs, cautious grants, and private unease. This essay traces how the possibility of shared time unsettled a civilization shaped by delay.

tags: ðŸ”’ The Bitcoin Chronicles - 1.F.5 - Rumors of Simultaneity

Long before simultaneity became operational, it existed as rumorâ€”circulating through sealed labs, cautious grants, and private unease. This essay traces how the possibility of shared time unsettled a civilization shaped by delay.
